sidebar.step_0.title: ðŸ“œ Mauya kuZvishandiso zveSalatiso zveOHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Ongorora zvishandiso zvedu zvizere nezviwanikwa kuti muvandudze hutano nekuchengetedzeka pabasa penyu.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: âš¡ Waizviziva here kuti kushandisa vatengesi vane mukurumbira uye vanotevedzera tsika kunogona kuderedza njodzi pabasa nekuona kuti basa rinoitwa nenguva uye nemhando yepamusoro pamwe nemitemo yekuchengetedza?
intro.title: Mauya kuZvishandiso zveSalatiso zveOHS
intro.description: Ongorora zvishandiso zvedu zvizere nezviwanikwa kuti muvandudze hutano nekuchengetedzeka pabasa penyu.
legal_obligations.client.title: Zvisungo zveMutengi
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(1)(a): Gadzirira Ongororo yeNjodzi yeKutanga (BRA) inoratidza njodzi dzeprojekiti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(1)(b): Ipa Rondedzero yeHutano neChengetedzo inotsanangura zvinodiwa zveprojekiti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(1)(l): Tambira Hurongwa hweHutano neChengetedzo hweMukonitirakiti basa risati ratanga.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Zvisungo zveMukonitirakiti
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Mutemo weKuvaka 7(1)(a): Tumira Hurongwa hweHutano neChengetedzo hwakavakirwa parondedzero yemutengi.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Mutemo weKuvaka 7(1)(b): Chengetedza Faili yeHutano neChengetedzo panzvimbo yebasa pamwe nemagwaro ose anodiwa.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Mutemo weKuvaka 9: Ita Ongororo dzeNjodzi neOngororo dzeKuzivikanwa kweNjodzi (HIRA) dzakanangana nebasa racho.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Zvisungo zveNyanzvi dzeH&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Mutemo weKuvaka 5(5): Vamiririri (PrCHSA) vanotungamirira H&S vachimiririra mutengi, vachiona kutevedzwa kwemitemo.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Mutemo weKuvaka 8(5): Maofisa (CHSO) vanobatsira vakonitirakiti mukushandisa nekuodita masisitimu eH&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Nhungamiro dzeSACPCMP: Vanofanira kuchengetedza kunyoresa nezvinodiwa zveCPD kuti vave nenyanzvi.
wizard.step_0: Tapota sarudza chiito kuti utange muitiro.

wizard.step_9.description: Ongorora zvauri kusarudza woisa magwaro mungoro yako kuti uenderere mberi.
cart.title: Ngoro Yako
cart.invoice_reference: Nhamba yeReferenzi yeInivhoisi: (Inoshanda kwemazuva manomwe. Nyoresa kuti uchengetedze zvachose!)
resources.title: Bata Nyanzvi dzeH&S Dzakatenderwa
resources.description: Unoda rubatsiro rwenyanzvi? Bata nyanzvi dzakatenderwa kuitira zvinodiwa zveprojekiti yako.

resources.john_smith: John Smith, Ofisa weSACPCMP (CHSO) - Nhamba yeKunyoresa: CHSO67890 - Bata: john.smith@example.com

footer.newsletter.title: Ramba Uchiziva Zvitsva
chatbot.response: Ndiri pano kubatsira! Kuti uwane mazano eOHS akakodzera iwe, tapota taura nenyanzvi.
training.title: Kudzidziswa Kwakazara Kwebasa
training.description: Ongorora zvirongwa zvedu zvizere zvekudzidzisa pabasa kuti uve nechokwadi chekutevedzera mitemo yeOHS yekuSouth Africa uye kukurudzira nzvimbo yebasa yakachengeteka. Sarudza kudzidziswa kunoitwa nemaoko, kudzidziswa kweboka, kana shandisa mubatsiri wedu kuti uwane mazano akakodzera zvichienderana neindasitiri yako, vateereri vaunotarisa, nenzvimbo.
training.wizard.start: Tapota sarudza sarudzo kuti utange muitiro wekurudziro yekudzidzisa.
training.wizard.step_1.title: Nhanho 1 ye5: Sarudza Indasitiri Yako
training.wizard.step_1.label: Indasitiri:
training.wizard.step_2.title: Nhanho 2 ye5: Sarudza Vateereri Vako Vaunotarisa
training.wizard.step_2.label: Vateereri Vaunotarisa (Sarudza zvese zvinoshanda):
training.wizard.step_2.error: Tapota sarudza vateereri vamwe chete vaunotarisa.
training.wizard.step_3.title: Nhanho 3 ye5: Dudza Nzvimbo Yako
training.wizard.step_4.title: Nhanho 4 ye5: Zvimwe Zvinodiwa
training.wizard.step_5.title: Nhanho 5 ye5: Ongorora Kudzidziswa Kunorudzirwa
training.wizard.step_5.description: Zvichienderana nezvawaisa, hezvino zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa zvinorudzirwa. Sarudza izvo zvaunoda kuwedzera kungoro yako.
training.cart.title: Ngoro Yako yeKudzidzisa
training.cart.customization.title: Gadzirisa Zvishandiso Zvako zveKudzidzisa
training.cart.customization.emergency_li: Tapota isa nhamba dzerunhare dzenhamo dzinoshanda (semuenzaniso, +27123456789).
training.cart.compiled_by.title: Yakagadzirwa Na
training.cart.training_type.title: Nzira yeKudzidzisa
training.cart.training_type.label: Sarudza Nzira yeKudzidzisa:
training.cart.training_type.online_num_p: Tapota isa nhamba yevanhu (pasi pemunhu mumwe chete).
training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Chirevo cheSafetyHelp: Zvishandiso zvekudzidzisa zvakapihwa ndezvekungopa ruzivo chete uye hazvireve mazano enyanzvi. Kuti uwane mhinduro dzeOHS dzakakodzera iwe, taura neSafetyHelp pa support@safetyhelp.co.za kana shanyira Peji reKubata.
training.checkout.success: Mubhadharo wabudirira! Zvishandiso zvako zvekudzidzisa zvagadzirwa. Dhawunirodha maPDF ako pazasi. Kwekudzidziswa paindaneti, makodhi ekupinda atumirwa kuemail yako.
training.providers.title: Vapi veKudzidzisa Vakatenderwa
training.providers.description: Unoda kudzidziswa uri pachako? Bata vapi vekudzidzisa vakatenderwa kuitira zvaunoda.
training.providers.provider_1: ABC Training Solutions - Yakatenderwa neSETA - Inonyanya kuita zveRubatsiro rweKutanga, Kudzima Moto - Bata: info@abctraining.co.za
training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Yakanyoreswa neSACPCMP - Inonyanya kuita zveChengetedzo Mukuvaka - Bata: training@safeskills.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Tenga Bhuku reKudzidzisa Rinogadziriswa
training.manual.purchase.description: Wana bhuku rekudzidzisa rakazara rakagadzirirwa kambani yako, rinosanganisira zvinodiwa nemutemo, zvinhu zvakanangana nekambani yako zvichibva pamufananidzo wako wenjodzi, nemakotesheni kubva kuvapi vekudzidzisa vakatenderwa.
training.manual.risk_profile.title: Dudza Mufananidzo WeNjodzi yeBhuku Rako reKudzidzisa
training.manual.risk_profile.label: Mufananidzo weNjodzi:
training.selection_method.title: Sarudza Nzira Yako yeKudzidzisa
training.legal_fact.step_1: Chokwadi Chepamutemo: Chikamu 8 cheMutemo weOHS chinoda kuti vashandirwi vape kudzidziswa kwakagadzirirwa njodzi dzakananga dzepabasa.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Chinhu Chinonakidza: Waizviziva here kuti kudzidziswa nguva nenguva kunogona kuderedza zviitiko zvepabasa kusvika pa30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Chokwadi Chepamutemo: Manisiparati emunharaunda anogona kunge aine mitemo yeOHS yakasiyana inokanganisa zvinodiwa zvekudzidzisa.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Chinhu Chinonakidza: Nzvimbo dzebasa dzine njodzi huru sedzenzvimbo dzekuvaka dzinoda kudzidziswa nguva nenguva kuti dzichengetedze mitemo yekuchengetedza.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Chokwadi Chepamutemo: Mutemo weOHS unomanikidza kudzidziswa kwakananga kwemabasa akaita sevamiririri veSHE kuti vave nechokwadi chekutevedzera.
legislation.title: Nhepfenyuro yeMutemo weOHS & Kutungamirira Njodzi
legislation.description: Gadzira nhepfenyuro yemutemo weOHS yakakodzera iwe nehurongwa hwekutungamirira njodzi zvebhizinesi rako. Isa mashoko ekambani yako, zviitiko, nenjodzi kuti uwane mushumo wakazara wekutevedzera unosanganisira mutemo weSouth Africa, mitemo yemakanzuru, nemitemo yenyika dzakawanda.
legislation.wizard.title: Gadzira RMP Yako
legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Nhanho 1 ye4: Mashoko eKambani
legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Nhanho 2 ye4: Zviitiko
legislation.wizard.step_2.label: Sarudza Zviitiko (Tinya zvese zvinoshanda):
legislation.wizard.step_3.title: Nhanho 3 ye4: Njodzi
legislation.wizard.step_3.label: Sarudza Njodzi (Tinya zvese zvinoshanda):
legislation.wizard.step_4.title: Nhanho 4 ye4: Ongorora woGadzira
legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Ongorora zvawaisa wogadzira RMP yako. Unogona kuwedzera mimwe mitemo kana zvichidiwa.
legislation.cart.title: Kubhadhara
legislation.cart.description: RMP yako yagadzirwa! Shandisa kadhi revhauchara FREERMP2025 kuti udhawunirodhe pachena (vashandisi 100 vekutanga).
suppliers.title: Dhairekitori reVatengesi veOHS
suppliers.description: Tsvaga uye uronge vatengesi veOHS muSouth Africa. Tsvaga nenzvimbo, masevhisi, uye zvitupa. Tumira ongororo kuti ubatsire vamwe kuita sarudzo dzine ruzivo.
suppliers.list.title: Rondedzero yeVatengesi
suppliers.table.name: Zita reMutengesi
suppliers.review_form.title: Tumira Ongororo
community_tools.title: Zvishandiso zveChengetedzo yeNharaunda
community_tools.description: Zivisa chero chiitiko chechengetedzo kana njodzi munharaunda yako kana pabasa, kubva pamakomba kusvika kumidziyo yakakanganisika. Shandisa zvishandiso zvedu kuona chengetedzo munzvimbo dzakaita sezvitoro zvespaza, zvikoro, zvipatara, nemabhawa.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Zivisa Chiitiko kana Njodzi
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Tsanangura chiitiko kana njodzi (semuenzaniso, gomba paMain Street, chigaro chakatyoka panzvimbo yenharaunda)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Zita Rako reSocia Media (Zvisiri Zvekumanikidzwa, semuenzaniso, @username paX):
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Isa runhare kana email (zvichazadzwa zvega kana mupi wacho akasarudzwa)...
Zita reSocia Media reMupi weSebhisi (Zvisiri Zvekumanikidzwa, semuenzaniso, @CityofJoburgZA paX):
Isa zita reX (richazadzwa zvega kana mupi wacho akasarudzwa)...
community_tools.list.title: Zvimwe Zvishandiso zveChengetedzo yeNharaunda
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Rondedzero yeOHS yeChitoro cheSpaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Onai kuti chitoro chenyu chespaza chinotevedzera zvinodiwa zvekuchengetedza moto, magetsi, uye zvivakwa maererano nemitemo yemakanzuru neMutemo weOHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Nhungamiro yeChengetedzo yeMoto kuChikoro
community_tools.list.school.description: Dzidza zvinodiwa nemutemo zvekuchengetedza moto kuzvikoro, kusanganisira hurongwa hwekubuda panjodzi nemidziyo.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Nhungamiro yeKugadzirira Nhamo kuChipatara
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Onai kuti zvipatara zvakagadzirira nhamo nehurongwa hwakakodzera hwekubuda panjodzi nemidziyo yekuchengetedza.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Rondedzero yeChengetedzo yeBhawa
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Tarisa kuti mabhawa anotevedzera mitemo yekuchengetedza moto nekutarisira vanhu kuti zviitiko zvisaitike.
dashboard.title: Dashibhodhi yeNhengo
dashboard.welcome: Mauya, [Zita reMushandisi]! Tungamirira kutevedzera kwako kweOHS, maRMP, ongororo dzevatengesi, nemishumo yenharaunda pano.
dashboard.profile.title: Mufananidzo weKambani
dashboard.rmps.title: MaRMP Akachengetedzwa
dashboard.supplier_reviews.title: Ongororo dzeVatengesi
dashboard.incident_reports.title: Mishumo yeZviitiko
document_categories.title: Gadzira Magwaro Ako eSisitimu yeKutungamirira OHS
document_categories.description: Sarudza uye gadzira magwaro aunoda esisitimu yako yekutungamirira OHS. Sarudza kubva pamitemo, maitiro, zviyero, nezvimwe, zvakagadzirirwa zvinodiwa nesangano rako.
document_categories.policies.title: Mitemo
document_categories.policies.description: Mashoko epamusoro-soro ezvinangwa nezvipikirwa, akatenderwa nehutungamiri hwepamusoro.
document_categories.policies.infectious_: Mutemo weCOVID-19 kana weKupindura Zvirwere Zvinotapukira
document_categories.policies.ohs_perform: Mutemo weKushanda, Kuongorora, uye Zvinangwa zveOHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_communi: Mutemo weKukurukurirana, Kupinda Muchikamu, uye Kubvunzana weOHS
document_categories.policies.ohs_workpla: Mutemo weHutano Nekugarika Zvakanaka Pabasa weOHS
document_categories.procedures.title: Maitiro
document_categories.procedures.descripti: Nhungamiro dzematanho ekuti mabasa anofanira kuitwa sei zvakachengeteka uye zvakafanana.
document_categories.standards.title: Zviyero/Nhungamiro
document_categories.standards.descriptio: Zviyero zvemukati zvinoenderana nemutemo kana tsika dzeindasitiri, zvinotsanangura mamiriro kana maitiro anotarisirwa.
document_categories.standards.hygiene_fa: Chiyero cheZvishandiso zveUtsanana (zvimbuzi, mvura, nzvimbo dzekuzororera)
document_categories.standards.ohs_perfor: Chiyero cheKushanda, Kuongorora, uye Zvinangwa zveOHS

document_categories.templates_forms.desc: Magwaro akagadzirwa kare ekuunganidza nekuenzanisa mashoko.

document_categories.permits.description: Mvumo dzinodzorwa dzemabasa ane njodzi huru kana akarambidzwa.
